sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the DCFS Residential Services Construction Grant
Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Eligibility for grant. To be eligible for a grant under this Act, a recipient must be a residential services provider
sections.text: with which the Department contracts for residential services.

sections.heading: Use of grant moneys. A recipient of a grant under this Act may use the grant moneys to do any one or more of the following:
sections.text: Use of grant moneys. A recipient of a grant under this Act may use the grant moneys to do any one or more of the following:

sections.heading: Reporting. Within 60 days after the first year of a grant under this Act, the grant recipient must submit a progress report to the Department
sections.text:
The Department may assist each grant recipient in meeting the goals and objectives stated
in the original grant proposal submitted by the recipient, in ensuring that grant moneys are being used for appropriate purposes, and in ensuring that residents of the community are being served by the new residential services sites established with grant moneys.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
